headline: Seeing is Believing: Yes, This Cuttlefish Is Wearing 3-D Glasses
abstract: Scientists knew octopuses and squid didnâ€™t have any depth perception, but they had a hunch their cuttlefish cousins might.
lead_paragraph: The cuttlefish hovers in the aquarium, its fins rippling and large, limpid eyes glistening. When a scientist drops a shrimp in, this cousin of the squid and octopus pauses, aims and shoots its tentacles around the prize.
